code:
'use strict';

const main = {
  arrowUp: '↑',
  arrowDown: '↓',
  arrowLeft: '←',
  arrowRight: '→',
  radioOn: '◉',
  radioOff: '◯',
  tick: '✔',
  cross: '✖',
  ellipsis: '…',
  pointerSmall: '›',
  line: '─',
  pointer: '❯'
};
const win = {
  arrowUp: main.arrowUp,
  arrowDown: main.arrowDown,
  arrowLeft: main.arrowLeft,
  arrowRight: main.arrowRight,
  radioOn: '(*)',
  radioOff: '( )',
  tick: '√',
  cross: '×',
  ellipsis: '...',
  pointerSmall: '»',
  line: '─',
  pointer: '>'
};
const figures = process.platform === 'win32' ? win : main;
module.exports = figures;
